text: In God We Trust is one of the national mottos of the United States. The other is E Pluribus Unum. In God We Trust has been put on American money since 1864 when it was added to a two-cent coin. A law passed in 1956 made it a national motto. It is also the motto of Florida. Category:State mottos of the United States Category:Florida Category:Mottos of the United States
title: In God We Trust
